verbs.description: [ARG0: Rudy Giuliani , President Donald Trump 's lawyer ,] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARG1: the Trump had reimbursed his personal lawyer for a secret payment to Stormy Daniels] .
Rudy Giuliani , President Donald Trump 's lawyer , said Wednesday the Trump [V: had] reimbursed his personal lawyer for a secret payment to Stormy Daniels .
